CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Specialist Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Specialist Hospital is arc {Emergency Medical Center}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Emergency Medical Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Emergency Medical Center is arc {Specialist Hospital}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Mental Health Hospital} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Tertiary General Hospital} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Rehabilitation Center to Emergency Medical Center in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Rehabilitation Center to Mental Health Hospital in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Mental Health Hospital to Specialist Hospital in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Emergency Medical Center and Mental Health Hospital in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Emergency Medical Center and Mental Health Hospital is {119}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Tertiary General Hospital and Emergency Medical Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Tertiary General Hospital and Emergency Medical Center is {69}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Rehabilitation Center?
SC.A: The total flow output from Rehabilitation Center is {138}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Specialist Hospital?
SC.A: The total flow input by Specialist Hospital is {130}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 145? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {158} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Tertiary General Hospital}, a flow of {151} from {Tertiary General Hospital} to {Mental Health Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 64? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {60} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Rehabilitation Center}, a flow of {49} from {Rehabilitation Center} to {Mental Health Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 85 and 111? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {104} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Emergency Medical Center}, a flow of {101} from {Emergency Medical Center} to {Rehabilitation Center}, a flow of {89} from {Rehabilitation Center} to {Emergency Medical Center}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Emergency Medical Center to Rehabilitation Center or from Mental Health Hospital to Specialist Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Specialist Hospital} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Emergency Medical Center to Tertiary General Hospital, from Mental Health Hospital to Specialist Hospital, or from Mental Health Hospital to Tertiary General Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Tertiary General Hospital} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Emergency Medical Center}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Mental Health Hospital} and {Tertiary General Hospital}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Mental Health Hospital, Arc Tertiary General Hospital, Arc Emergency Medical Center, Arc Rehabilitation Center, Arc Specialist Hospital}.
